department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.en: "This course is designed to take the basic knowledge of electrical circuits in the last semester and to teach students how to apply electronic circuits to biomedical measurement. The lab will be divided into three modules: (1) passive components AC circuit, (2) active component characteristic circuit, and (3) simple biomechanical measurement, to enable students to learn how to Application circuit design in the Health and measurement, and enhance student circuit analysis and design capabilities."
goal.ch: 本課程主要承接上學期電子電路學之電學基礎知識，進一步教導學生瞭解如何將電子電路學應用於生醫量測。本實驗課程採用NI ELVIS II+工作站進行操作，實驗將分為三個單元：(1)被動元件交流電路、(2)主動元件特性電路，以及(3)簡易生醫量測，裨使學生學習如何應用電路設計於生醫量測，並提昇學生電路分析與設計能力。

content.en:
"Week 1: Introduction
Lab 2: Introduction to Lab Environment
Week 3: Experiment ? - Resistance and Capacitance
Week 4: Experiment ? - Current and partial pressure measurement
Week 5: Experiment ? - Transient Analysis of AC Sine Wave Input
Week 6: Experiment 4 - Frequency response of the RL / RC line
Week 7: Experiment ?-RLC oscillation circuit
Week 8: Diodes to Transistors (Lessons Learned)
Week 9: Experiment ? - Diodes and Transistors
Week 10: Operational Amplifier Features (Teach Lessons)
Week 11: Experiment ? - Operational Amplifier Line Characteristics
Week 12: Active Filters and Instrumentation Amplifiers (Lessons Learned)
Week 13: Experiment ? - Frequency response of the active filter
Week 14: Experiment ? - Instrumentation Amplifier
Week 15: Experiment ? - Body temperature measurement
Week 16: Experiment ? - Single-lead electrocardiogram measurement
Week 17: Experiment ? - Electromyography of the Health and Medical Measurement"
content.ch:
"Week 1: 導論
Week 2: 實驗環境介紹與LabView
Week 3: 實驗?－電阻與電容
Week 4: 實驗?－電流與分壓量測
Week 5: 實驗?－交流弦波輸入之暫態分析
Week 6: 實驗?－RL/RC線路之頻率響應
Week 7: 實驗?－RLC振盪線路
Week 8: 二極體到電晶體 (講授課程)
Week 9: 實驗?－二極體與電晶體
Week 10:運算放大器特性 (講授課程)
Week 11:實驗?－運算放大器線路特性
Week 12:主動濾波器與儀表放大器 (講授課程)
Week 13:實驗?－主動濾波器之頻率響應
Week 14:實驗?－儀表放大器
Week 15:實驗?－體表溫度之生醫量測
Week 16:實驗?－單導程心電圖之生醫量測
Week 17:實驗?－肌電圖之生醫量測
Week 18:電路實作期末測驗"

textbook.en: Electrical Engineering: Principles & Applications by Allan R. Hambley
textbook.ch: 電氣工程：原理與應用 Allan R. Hambley

grading.ch: "出 席:12% 結果報告 :48% 期末考試 :40%"

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning

ch.competency: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
